typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Empid as string,
		EmployeeName as string,
		Address as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Salary as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employeedata
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		{ deptname} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> departmentdata
employeedata aggregate(groupBy(Department),
	totalemployees = count(Empid)) ~> Aggregate1
employeedata, departmentdata join(Department == deptid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['allemployeedeptdata.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['Allemployeedatabydept.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Empid,
		EmployeeName,
		Address,
		PhoneNumber,
		Salary,
		deptid,
		{ deptname}
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
